newsitem.title: FRANCE: French CFDT union calls Dec 3 gas/electric strike.
newsitem.headline: French CFDT union calls Dec 3 gas/electric strike.

text.p: The CFDT trade union said on Monday it had called for a one-day strike on December 3 at French state gas and electricity utilities EDF and GDF in defence of jobs and the public service.
"The federal executive of the FGE-CFDT calls on all staff to participate fully in a combative strike on December 3 in defence of jobs and the public service," said a CFDT statement.
The strike should lead to "significant" falls in production, the union added.

"In the face of deregulation and opening up to competition, the companies are at a watershed. A rationale of productivity and job-destructive competitiveness will only get worse under pressure from management which is not hiding its desire to cut 15,000 jobs in the years to come," it said.
It called for minimum unemployment guarantees and progress of work time reduction.
